entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets overnight. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
